name: quickjsonconfig
description: Simple JavaScript package to read in json files for project configuration

scripts.docs: node_modules/documentation/bin/documentation.js build --format html --output docs --project-name 'Quick Json Config' --project-description 'Simple JavaScript package to read in json files for project configuration' --project-homepage 'https://www.npmjs.com/package/quickjsonconfig'

author: Mark Kozel <development@markkozel.net>
